From: 
To: (USANYS)" <1 
Cc: 'it jANIa 
" .; alle.)
Subject: RE: draft response to Epstein defense preservation requests 
Date: Fri, 09 Aug 2019 17:27:13 +0000 
Sure — let us know if we're ultimately able to send today, otherwise we'll check back on Monday, thanks. 
From: (USANYS) 
<i
Sent: Friday, August 09, 2019 13:26 
To: 
Cc: (USANYS)  
Subject: Re: draft response to Epstein defense preservation requests 
Okay, thanks. is signed off but we may have to chat briefly with MI when he's back on Monday. 
Sent from my iPhone 
On Aug 9, 2019, at 1:21 PM, 
> 
wrote: 
I'm totally available to update it this afternoon if there are edits today, but realistically I don't think the defense can 
make much more hay about having gotten a response on the 9th versus the 12th 
From: (USANYS)  
Sent: Friday, August 09, 2019 13:20 
To: 
Cc: (USANYS) <1_ 
> 
Subject: Re: draft response to Epstein defense preservation requests 
If we don't get this out until Monday is that a problem? 
Sent from my iPhone 
On Aug 8, 2019, at 5:56 PM, 
1c 
cS; 
> 
wrote: 
No problem, thanks, and the edits were all straightforward. Updated version attached, everything incorporated, and 
can go tom— I'm out of commission the next couple hours but back after that. 
thanks, 
From: (USANYS)  
Sent: Thursday, August 08, 2019 16:36 
To: (USANYS) 
EFTA00027856

Cc:
Subject: RE: draft response to Epstein defense preservation requests 
Sorry for the delay. Combined edits from both of us, attached. Can you take a look and clean up —  we would then like 
to give at least the option of weighing in before we send to defense counsel. 
From: 
Sent: Thursday, August 8, 2019 11:44 AM 
To: (USANYS) 
Cc:
Subject: RE: draft response to Epstein defense preservation requests 
(USANYS) 
C 
Wanted to bump this from Tuesday, especially since I know you guys are out tomorrow — hopefully we can send it out 
today? Happy to incorporate any edits etc. Thanks. 
From: 
Sent: Tuesday, August 06, 2019 15:01 
To: (USANYS) 
Cc: 
) 
Subject: RE: draft response to Epstein defense preservation requests 
(USANYS)
This has been in the works for a little while, due to various other things that have come up in the interim, but we 
didn't want it to get lost given the discovery motion schedule. The attached is based on our conversations with M, 
including his email with suggested language for the prefatory language, and responds to the two attached defense 
letters. Happy to discuss anytime and to incorporate comments and suggestions. 
thanks, 
Assistant U.S. Attorney 
Southern District of New York 
<2019-08-08, JE, letter to defense re preservation requests.docx> 
EFTA00027857
